featured.text: Glenn, who retires from the U.S. Senate next month, joins a list of individuals and sports teams honored with more than one ticker-tape parade.

definition.zh_def: 參議院：一個立法機構的上院，通常負責審議和通過法律。
definition.en_def: Senate: The upper chamber of a legislative body, typically responsible for reviewing and passing laws.
definition.example: The Senate voted on the new healthcare bill yesterday.
